backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Veil app defining data types (User, Post, Reaction, InviteCode), state maps, and business logic including invite code seeding, subscription status checks, and post/reaction management with authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that filters out anonymous users and ensures default VEIL invite codes exist when upgrading actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement (REQ-146) to add an anonymous-principal guard in useQueries.ts before any actor call is dispatched.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, key logic, and notable fixes across pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and a Toaster notification provider.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin panel UI with five tabbed sections (Public Posts, Members, Invite Codes, Post History, Admin Signup) and a back-to-dashboard navigation button.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin component for managing invite codes, supporting adding custom codes, generating random ones, revoking existing ones, and copying invite links to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Displays a sorted list of all public posts for admins, with emotion badges, reaction counts, and a confirmation dialog to permanently delete individual posts.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignup.tsx: Admin-only form that bypasses invite codes to register a new user account with a pseudonym and region selection.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin panel component listing all users in an accordion, allowing admins to suspend/unsuspend users and change their subscription status.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin tool to look up and display a user's post history by principal ID, with the ability to delete individual posts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge pill for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy) using emotion-specific colors and labels.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing the copyright year and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, nav links (including admin link if applicable), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-height flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a single user-owned post card with support for inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility, enforcing word count and subscription requirements.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Displays a public post with emotion badge, timestamp, reaction count, and reaction buttons (support/care/strength), preventing owners from reacting to their own posts.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Shows a warning banner indicating an expired subscription with region-specific pricing information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and persisted identity state across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, roles, posts, reactions, subscriptions, invite codes, and RSVPs with authentication guards.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, custom OKLCH color tokens for light/dark themes, emotion-specific colors, and reusable component classes like veil-card and emotion badges.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users and renders the AdminDashboard component for authorized admins.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Displays a chronologically sorted list of public community posts using PublicPostCard, with auth guards redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing emotion-based post creation buttons and a subscription banner, with posting disabled when the subscription is expired.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects users to the dashboard or signup based on profile existence.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's own posts sorted by date using PostCard, with an empty state prompt to create the first post.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Post creation form allowing users to select an emotion type and write content, enforcing subscription status and minimum word count requirements before submission.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page where new authenticated users choose a pseudonym and region to create their anonymous Veil profile.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Utility functions for checking subscription status (active/grace/expired), determining post/public permissions, and returning region-based pricing strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Provides word counting utilities with a minimum word count constant (24) and a helper to determine which emotion types require the minimum word threshold.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography fonts, border radii, box shadows, and enabling dark mode, animate, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 51) for Veil, a private emotional sharing platform, including architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features.
